channel.title: USB mouse + Axoloti + Analog4
channel.description:
Playing around with the mouse object and the simplest of fm patches, mostly just wanted to make a video to show this unique feature of the axoloti
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i70o5S-2tEw&feature=youtu.be

item.title: USB mouse + Axoloti + Analog4
item.dc:creator: @Databroth
item.description:
@Databroth wrote:

Thank you!
the patch is super simple, just mouse X to vca V, mouse Y to sine osc Freq, sine osc Freq to vca A, vca to (different) sine osc freq and pitch to output

I'm mostly using the A4 to sequence different enveloped filters to get some rhythm. no oscillators on the A4 just audio into the different filters.

Read full topic
